item.title: Cones to prevent the public to park, 28th September
item.description:
Dear Sir, Madam I am writing to report that door staff at Les Ambassadors Casino are regularly placing cones on the public road to block parking spaces and prevent members of the public from parking there. This appears to be an improper use of the public street for private purposes. Please investigate and take any necessary action. A photo is attached for your reference. Yours faithfully, A concerned resident

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Hamilton Place, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastic safety barriers outside number 95 on pavement, 28th September
item.description:
This obstruction has been on the pavement for the last few months. You cannot walk on the pavement, you have to go out in the road. I nearly fell over it last night in the dark. This is completely unacceptable after all this time. This needs URGENT removal please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Hayes Chase, West Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
